channel.title: Need some help
channel.description:
Ok moderators ik this is in the right spot so dont delete it
i need a code for full agilty in the wilderness arena (use glory) And i also need the code where when you reach a 99 you get untrimmed skillcape trimmed skillcape and hood

item.title: Need some help
item.dc:creator: @ricky_james ricky james
item.description:
@ricky_james wrote:

[quote=“zubmage, post:8, topic:189239”][quote author=ricky james link=topic=252117.msg2109314#msg2109314 date=1205553538]

How in the name of all thats holy did you get 200 rep with asking questions such as these?
[/quote]I was a good coder and was on forums projects etc. my rep dont matter i quit and became rusty and forgot all about coding

I see. Well search for public void levelup(int skill) In your Client.Java

Then add the following after Case 15:

case 16: // Agility // sendFrame164(4277); // sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced an Agility level!", 4278); // sendFrame126("Your agility level is now "+playerLevel[16]+" .", 4279); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced an agility level."); // NpcDialogueSend = true; if (playerLevel[16] >= 99) { addItem(14097, 1); addItem(14098, 1); addItem(14099, 1); sendMessage( "Congratulations, you just recived the agility skill cape"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " has just gotten " + playerLevel[16] + " Agility!"); } break;

And your welcome.[/quote]I need all them

Read full topic

item.title: Need some help
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

[quote=“ricky james, post:7, topic:189239”][quote author=zubmage link=topic=252117.msg2109303#msg2109303 date=1205553360]
How in the name of all thats holy did you get 200 rep with asking questions such as these?
[/quote]I was a good coder and was on forums projects etc. my rep dont matter i quit and became rusty and forgot all about coding[/quote]

I see. Well search for public void levelup(int skill) In your Client.Java

Then add the following after Case 15:

case 16: // Agility // sendFrame164(4277); // sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced an Agility level!", 4278); // sendFrame126("Your agility level is now "+playerLevel[16]+" .", 4279); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced an agility level."); // NpcDialogueSend = true; if (playerLevel[16] >= 99) { addItem(14097, 1); addItem(14098, 1); addItem(14099, 1); sendMessage( "Congratulations, you just recived the agility skill cape"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " has just gotten " + playerLevel[16] + " Agility!"); } break;

And your welcome.

Read full topic
